Search for businesses by category with automatic photo analysis

This endpoint:
1. Searches for businesses using Google Places API
2. Automatically analyzes photos in the background using multimodal AI
3. Returns businesses with initial data immediately
4. Photo analysis results are added as they complete

- Visual quality score
- Business insights from images
- Improvement recommendations
- Customer perception analysis
